terms.definition: A cloud-based platform that outsources the interview process to external experts, providing standardized candidate assessments and evaluations for hiring companies.
Artificial Intelligence-powered interview processes that use automated systems and algorithms to conduct, evaluate, or assist in candidate interviews.
Software as a Service - a cloud computing model where software applications are delivered over the internet on a subscription basis rather than installed locally.
A comprehensive software environment that provides the foundation and tools for developing, deploying, or running applications and services.
Application Programming Interface - a set of rules and protocols that allows different software applications to communicate and share data with each other.
The ability of a system or platform to handle increased workload or user demand by adding resources without compromising performance.
The process of implementing consistent procedures, formats, and criteria across systems to ensure uniformity and reduce variability in outcomes.
Remote interview sessions conducted through video conferencing technology, allowing real-time visual and audio communication between interviewers and candidates.
Software or services that are hosted on remote servers and accessed via the internet rather than installed on local computers.
The practice of contracting external service providers to handle specific business functions or processes instead of managing them internally.
Predetermined standards and metrics used to evaluate and measure candidate performance, skills, and suitability during the interview process.
Systematic approaches and techniques used to minimize subjective judgments and unfair preferences in decision-making processes.
A collection or database of potential job applicants who have been identified, screened, or are available for specific positions.
The process of connecting different software systems or platforms to work together seamlessly and share data effectively.
The systematic improvement of business processes to increase efficiency, reduce waste, and enhance overall productivity.
